Allies.Benefit: Ally makes one Knowledge, Skulduggery, or Streetwise check with

Tiers.Name: Trained Apprentice
Tiers.Benefit: Add automatic [AD] to all combat checks, or add +1 melee defense. The Warrior chooses which at the beginning of each turn, and the effect lasts until the beginning of the Warrior's next turn.

Tiers.Name: Experienced Apprentice
Tiers.Benefit: Add automatic [SU][AD] to all combat checks, or add +2 melee defense. The Warrior chooses which at the beginning of each turn, and the effect lasts until the beginning of the Warrior's next turn.

Followers.Benefit: Follower makes one Computers, Mechanics, or Medicine check with

Tiers.Name: Local Gym
Tiers.Benefit: Add [BO] to follower and ally checks, and to checks made with the aid of an apprentice.

Tiers.Name: Respected Dojo
Tiers.Benefit: Add [BO][BO] to follower and ally checks, add [AD] to checks made with the aid of an apprentice.

Tiers.Name: Training Academy
Tiers.Benefit: Upgrade ability of follower and ally checks, add [SU][AD] to checks made with the aid of an apprentice.

Tiers.Name: Minor Title
Tiers.Benefit: Once per encounter, add [BO][BO] to the next applicable Social skill check.

Tiers.Name: Moderate Title
Tiers.Benefit: Once per encounter, upgrade the next applicable Social skill check.

Tiers.Name: Major Title
Tiers.Benefit: Once per encounter, add [SU][SU] to the next applicable Social skill check.
